comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.jstor.org/pss/2212177 suggests that this may be Colonel Thomas H Birch who was "Envoy extraordinary and minister plenipotentiary for the United States of America near [sic] the Portuguese Republic" in 1914. See www.flickr.com/photos/22287142@N02/2177393806/ and www.flickr.com/photos/22287142@N02/sets/72157603668528252/ for more photos.
